pullrequest.title: [DON'T MERGE] Update launch files to call the correct spawner method

content.raw: @{557058:14b7fd50-d65a-47a8-825c-fa89681d07bd} 's test cases indicate that there is a _very_ simple workaround \(changing launch order\) so I agree this PR should not be merged before Urban Circuit. The Code Freeze should be maintained as much as possible.
content.html: @Arthur Schang 's test cases indicate that there is a very simple workaround (changing launch order) so I agree this PR should not be merged before Urban Circuit. The Code Freeze should be maintained as much as possible.
